chunks.text: Amnesty International is a global movement that campaigns for a world where human rights are enjoyed by all. We investigate and expose abuses, educate and mobilize the public, and help transform societies to create a safer, more just world. We received the Nobel Peace Prize for our life-saving work.

metadata.question: How does Amnesty International work to protect human rights?
metadata.answer: Amnesty International investigates abuses, educates the public, and mobilizes communities to transform societies and protect human rights.
